description: Upward Mobility presents the first Palm webOS to prepare you for the International Association of Culinary Professionals' Certified Culinary Professional (CCP) Exam.  This app contains 400 focused questions, written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  This exam prep app covers the essential topics on the CCP exam, including Asian cuisine, foods of North America, French cuisine, Italian cuisine, wine, beer and spirits, baking, food chemistry, food identification, nutrition, and sanitation/food safety.  ||  The Certified Culinary Professional designation offered by the IACP is the foremost accepted culinary certification, and is awarded to "individuals who have demonstrated and maintain comprehensive knowledge of the culinary arts and sciences."  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
